title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4027.1 - Time for overnight entries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4027.1 - Time for overnight entries

State Regulations

In the absence of conditions or notice to the contrary, entries for overnight races are to be made at the office of the racing
secretary by 2 p.m. on the day before the race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4027.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
